biotools.summary: YeastMate is a tool for the automated detection and segmentation of S. cerevisae cells and their mating and budding events, as well as a subclassification of the cells involved in these events into mother and daughter cells.

bioschemas.name: YeastMate
bioschemas.summary: YeastMate is a tool for the automated detection and segmentation of S. cerevisae cells and their mating and budding events, as well as a subclassification of the cells involved in these events into mother and daughter cells.
